titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory of the Poland. Rada Narodowa. Records, 1940-1945
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 2000 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Poland. Rada Narodowa. Records,
did.abstract: Decrees, reports, stenographic records, minutes of meetings, and speeches, relating to political developments in Poland and Eastern Europe, and to activities of the Polish Government-in-Exile.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Poland. Rada Narodowa. Records, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1976.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

did.unittitle: Archives of the Polish National Council
First Council
Plenary Sessions - opening session, 1940 January 23 (order of the day, speeches, motions) (8 typewritten and mimeographed items, 27 pages. List included)
Presidium of Council - records of meetings, 1941 March 22-July 3 (10 typewritten items, 12 pages. List included)
Commissions
Legal-Constitutional Commission - stenographic records of meetings, 1940 March 4-1941 July 10 (13 typewritten items, 74 pages. List included
Commission on Budget and Economical Affairs
Part I Stenographic records of meetings, 1940 March 4-1941 March 13 (32 typewritten items, 606 pages. List included)
Part II Drafts, motions, and reports concerning budget of 1940 and 1941 (169 typewritten and mimeographed items, 203 pages. List included)
Commission on Foreign Affairs - stenographic records of meetings, 1940 March 4-1941 July 10 (13 typewritten items, 131 pages. List included)
Commission on Military Affairs - stenographic records of meetings, 1940 March 4-1941 February 10 (15 typewritten items, 197 pages. List included)
Commission on Emigration - stenographic records of meetings, 1940 August 26-1941 May 29 (4 typewritten items, 50 pages. List included)
Second Council
Plenary Sessions
Documents concerning the convocation of the II National Council (6 typewritten items. List included)
Stenographic records of meetings
Meetings 1-34, 1942 February 24-July 14 (34 typewritten items. List included)
Meetings 35-69, 1942 July 18-1943 March 30 (36 typewritten items. List of items in Folder 10)
Meetings 70-99, 1943 April 1-October 8 (34 typewritten items. List of items in Folder 10)
Meetings 100-129, 1943 December 2-1944 May 19 (30 typewritten items. List of items in Folder 10)
Meetings 130-161, 1944 May 26-1945 January 5 (31 typewritten items. List of items in Folder 10)
Presidium of Council - records of meetings, 1942 March 16-1944 December 12 (89 typewritten items, 102 pages. List of items included)
Commissions
List of Commissions and its members (6 mimeographed items, 6 pages. List of items included)
Legal-Constitutional Commission - stenographic records of meetings, 1942 March 11-1945 February 23 (61 typewritten items. List of items included)
Commission on Budget and Economical Affairs
Part I Stenographic records of meetings, 1942 March 11-1944 December 22
1942 March 14-1943 March 1 (54 typewritten items. List included)
1943 March 2-1944 December 21 (88 typewritten items. List of items included in Folder 18)
Part II Drafts, motions, and reports concerning Budget of 1942, 1943, 1944 (56 typewritten and mimeographed items. List of items included)
Commission on Foreign Affairs - stenographic records of meetings, 1942 March 11-1945 March 14 (26 typewritten items. List of items included)
Commission on Military Affairs - stenographic records of meetings, 1942 March 11-1945 January 31 (40 typewritten items. List of items included)
Special Commission on War Budget - minutes of meetings, 1942 April 13-1943 December 25 (4 typewritten items. List of items included)
Special Commission - Inquiry on Treatment of Jews in the Polish Army - stenographic records of meetings, 1944 May 17-1945 January 29 (20 typewritten items. List of items included)
Bulletins (2 items, dated 1942 October 30 and 1943 February 1. Mimeographed)
Documents pertaining to I and II Council
Reports of Commissions, 1940-1944
a Legal-Constitutional Commission (19 items)
b Commission on Foreign Affairs (5 items)
c Commission on Military Affairs (5 items)
d Social-Economical Commission (1 item) List of items included
Interpellations to the Government (31 typewritten items. 33 pages. List of items included)
Motions presented by Members of Council, 1940-1944 (98 typewritten and mimeographed items. 85 pages. List of items included)
Resolutions - proposed, 1940-1944 (62 typewritten and mimeographed items 37 pages. List of items included)
Resolutions - adopted, 1940-1943 (45 typewritten and mimeographed items. 69 pages. List of items included)
Decrees of the President of the Republic - drafts and definite texts (49 typewritten and mimeographed items. List of items included)
Reports and speeches - Plenary Sessions and Commissions (27 typewritten and mimeographed items. List of items included)
Miscellaneous documents and papers
Papers concerning relations with Czechoslovak National Council (7 typewritten and mimeographed items. List of items included)
Various materials - reports of Ministries, press reports, correspondence, etc. (63 typewritten and mimeographed items. List of items included)
Stenography of the First National Council (Émigré Parliament)
Dekret Prezydenta Rzeczpospolitej z dnia 9.XII. 1939 r. o Radzie Narodowej Rzeczpospolitej Polskiej (1 copy)
Spis czlonkow Pierwszej Rady Narodowej (1 copy)
Stenogramy posiedzen Rady Narodowej (No 1, 2, 3, 4, 4a, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 9a, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15)
Stenogram z konferencji Rady Narodowej odbytej dnia 19 VI. 1940 w Libourne - upadek Francji (1 copy
Stenogram z konferencji Rady Narodowej odbytej dnia 7 VII. 1940 w Londynie - pierwsze zebranie na ziemi angielskiej (1 copy)
Stenogramy posiedzen Rady Narodowej (No 16. 17, 18)
Stenogramy posiedzen Rady Narodowej (No 19 - film wykonany ze skrotu posiedzenia, zalaczony z pudeleczku zel.)
Stenogramm No 20 missing (even in the original)
Minutes of meetings, 1940-1941
